extension.author: RuposTel.com
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
extension.description:
CDN buffer rewrite system plugin. It replaces all your www.domain.com with cdn.domain.com. Please configure a proper search domain at the configuration of this plugin. Note that you may need to add these lines to your htaccess on your CDN server to allow full cross site access:
Header add Access-Control-Allow-Origin "*"
Header add Access-Control-Allow-Headers "origin, x-requested-with, content-type"
Header add Access-Control-Allow-Methods "PUT, GET, POST, DELETE, OPTIONS"

field.name: domainname
field.description: Set your domain name without http prefix, example: www.domain.com
field.label: Your domain name

field.name: cdndomainname
field.description: Set your CDN domain name without http prefix, example: cdn.domain.com
field.label: Your CDN domain name

field.name: directory
field.description: If site runs in a folder, enter your /folder/ and if site does not run in a folder, enter only /
field.label: Folder (see desciption)

field.name: cdndirectory
field.description: If CDN runs in a folder, enter your /cdnfolder/ and if site does not run in a folder, enter only /
field.label: Folder (see desciption)
